name: S.N.T. INDUSTRIES, INC., a corporation, and Stephen P. Stavros and Tula Stavros v. Clifford T. GEANOPULOS and Thomas Geanopulos, individuals, The Doggery, Inc., a corporation and Nicholas Geanopulos, Petitioners

parties: S.N.T. INDUSTRIES, INC., a corporation, and Stephen P. Stavros and Tula Stavros v. Clifford T. GEANOPULOS and Thomas Geanopulos, individuals, The Doggery, Inc., a corporation and Nicholas Geanopulos, Petitioners.

opinions.text: Petition for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, No. 22 W.D. Appeal Docket 1986.

casebody.head_matter:
507 A.2d 368
S.N.T. INDUSTRIES, INC., a corporation, and Stephen P. Stavros and Tula Stavros v. Clifford T. GEANOPULOS and Thomas Geanopulos, individuals, The Doggery, Inc., a corporation and Nicholas Geanopulos, Petitioners.

March 31, 1986.
